header.heading: Scambi’s Labs are where the magic happens.
header.desc: Participants are involved in paneurethic experiences and can create their own path through the activities, approaching the them from different perspectives, in order to know better themselves, others and the world around them.

labs-def.heading: What are Labs?
labs-def.text: Labs are some sort of “work-groups”, guided by an expert host aimed at exploring from many different perspectives the current edition theme.
